content: AboutSearch this siteEmbedded FilesSkip to main contentSkip to navigationNisha PanwarAssistant Professor School of Computer and Cyber Sciences Augusta UniversityEmail: npanwar [AT] augusta [DOT] eduTwitter: @nisha_n_world Research Interests:CVSmart home security and privacy (slide)Multi-tenant IoT security and privacy (slide)Vehicle communication and security (slide video)Contact-tracing data privacy issues (short-talk)Prospective students: I am looking for motivated PhD students who are interested in working on IoT data security and trusted sensing in smart spaces. NewsMay 2021: Paper accepted in Smartcomp 2021 Congratulations! to all co-authors.April 2021: PostDoc position in Distributed Computing Cluster group is available. Please contact if interested.October 2020: 5G Security and Privacy Preserving Vehicular Communication paper accepted in NCA 2020May 2020: Our work on secure contact tracing system appeared on Augusta NewsMay 2020: Short-talk accepted in IEEE Security&Privacy 2020March 2020: Smart Home Security paper accepted in Transactions on Cyber-Physical Systems March 2020: Secure Data Outsourcing paper accepted in Transactions on Knowledge and Data EngineeringMarch 2020: Blockchain based solution review accepted in AFCEA Army Signal ConferenceJanuary 2020: Joined AU Google SitesReport abusePage detailsPage updated Google SitesReport abuse
